DOC.brief_summary: This retrospective , chart review , observational study assess effect MK-0954A ( losartan potassium 50 mg + hydrochlorothiazide 12.5 mg [ Hyzaar ( R ) ] ) treatment period least three month serum uric acid level .
DOC.brief_title: Impact MK-0954A Uric Acid Management Hypertension ( MK-0954A-366 )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Participant > 20 year < 75 year age index date ( i.e. , date initiating MK0954A therapy ) Diagnosed hypertension receive MK0954A 50/12.5 mg least 3 month Had least one serum uric acid measurement baseline one 3 month use MK0954A 50/12.5 mg Had follow record document chart data collection period : medical history comorbidities ( available ) sit blood pressure , serum uric acid , lipid profile test result use MK0954A 50/12.5 mg serum electrolyte , serum creatinine , premeal sugar ( available ) prescription information antihypertensive regimen Exclusion criterion : Had treat diuretic angiotensinreceptor blocker ( ARBs ) 2 week initiate treatment MK0954A 50/12.5 mg Serum creatinine > 2 mg/dL
DOC.keyword: Essential hypertension Uric acid Retrospective Hyzaar
